channel.title: Run RSPS on Linux?
channel.description:
I've been trying to figure out how to run a RSPS on linux, I have a VPS that's linux based, and one that's windows based. However, the specs of the two:
Linux: 24gb RAM 200gb HDD 4-2.8ghZ processers
Windows: 4gb RAM 50gb HDD 2-2.6ghZ processors
The linux VPS is much better, so I'd prefer to use that. Any tips on setting up a RSPS on Linux?

item.title: Run RSPS on Linux?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/309503-running-rsps-centos-linux.html

Couldn’t have explained it better then that.

Read full topic
